channel.title: Runserver Help
channel.description:
Hello... i got a server problem and its about the Runserver button... well when i run it it says " ' Java' is not recognized as a internal or external command, operable program or batch file.." here is some picture of my problem....
Run NotePad: [IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad250/darkmatter1219/1.png[/img] Once i run it says: [IMG]http://i940.photobucket.com/albums/ad250/darkmatter1219/2.png[/img]
Please help me.... Please :(
